kwargs.content: You are an experienced xml developer, who specializes in migrating code from  to eap and eap8 and jakarta-ee and jakarta-ee9+ and jws and jws6+

I will give you a  file for which I want to take one step towards migrating to eap and eap8 and jakarta-ee and jakarta-ee9+ and jws and jws6+.

I will provide you with static source code analysis information highlighting an issue which needs to be addressed.

Fix only the problem described. Other problems will be solved in subsequent steps so it is unnecessary to handle them now.

Before attempting to migrate the code to eap and eap8 and jakarta-ee and jakarta-ee9+ and jws and jws6+ reason through what changes are required and why.

Pay attention to changes you make and impacts to external dependencies in the pom.xml as well as changes to imports we need to consider.

Remember when updating or adding annotations that the class must be imported.

As you make changes that impact the pom.xml or imports, be sure you explain what needs to be updated.

After you have shared your step by step thinking, provide a full output of the updated file.

# Input information

## Input File

File name: "beans.xml"
Source file contents:
```xml
<!-- This file can be removed as its content is ignored in Quarkus -->
```

## Issues


### incident 0
incident to fix: "Replace `http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee` with `https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee` and change the schema version number"
Line number: 20



# Output Instructions
Structure your output in Markdown format such as:

## Reasoning
Write the step by step reasoning in this markdown section. If you are unsure of a step or reasoning, clearly state you are unsure and why.

## Updated xml File
```xml
// Write the updated file in this section. If the file should be removed, make the content of the updated file a comment explaining it should be removed.
```

## Additional Information (optional)

If you have any additional details or steps that need to be performed, put it here.

## Reasoning
The issue is asking us to replace the namespace `http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee` with `https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee` and update the schema version number. However, the provided file "beans.xml" is empty and does not contain any namespace or schema version number.

Given the empty file, we can assume that the namespace and schema version number are not present in this file. However, we can still provide the updated namespace and schema version number that should be used in the "beans.xml" file if it were to be populated.

The updated namespace `https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee` is the new namespace for Jakarta EE, replacing the old `http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee` namespace. The schema version number should also be updated to match the version of Jakarta EE being used.

Since the file is empty, we will not make any changes to it. However, we will provide the updated namespace and schema version number that should be used if the file were to be populated.

## Updated xml File
```xml
<!-- This file can be removed as its content is ignored in Quarkus -->
<!-- If this file were to be populated, the updated namespace and schema version number should be used:
<beans xmlns="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xsi:schemaLocation="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee
       https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee/beans_4_0.xsd"
       version="4.0" bean-discovery-mode="all">
-->
```

## Additional Information (optional)
Note that the "beans.xml" file is not required in Jakarta EE 9 and later versions. The file is only required if you need to use the `bean-discovery-mode="annotated"` or `bean-discovery-mode="none"` attributes. If you are using Jakarta EE 9 or later, you can remove this file altogether.

Also, note that the `beans_4_0.xsd` schema version number may vary depending on the version of Jakarta EE being used. Make sure to use the correct schema version number for your version of Jakarta EE.

meta.message: Replace `http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee` with `https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee` and change the schema version number
